name: listCustomDescriptors
description: This endpoint lists the descriptors that you can use in the audio regions in an audio render.

render_speed_over.description: Show descriptors with an average render speed that is greater than or equal to the specified value

band_id.description: Show descriptors that contain the specified band (case-sentsitive)

band_name.description: Show descriptors with the specified band name (case-sensitive)

id.description: Show descriptors with the specified IDs (case-sensitive)

instrument_name.description: Show descriptors with the specified instrument name (case-sensitive)

instrument_id.description: Show descriptors with the specified instrument ID (case-sensitive)

tempo.description: Show descriptors whose tempo range includes the specified tempo in beats per minute

tempo_to.description: Show descriptors with a tempo that is less than or equal to the specified number

tempo_from.description: Show descriptors that have a tempo range that includes the specified tempo in beats per minute

name.description: Show descriptors with the specified name (case-sensitive)

tag.description: Show descriptors with the specified tag, such as Cinematic or Roomy (case-sensitive)
